description: This table holds the no-add, single-response items from the Bed Events (BEV) master file.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the bed event record.

columns.name: EVENT_TYPE_C
columns.description:
The bed event type category number for this bed event.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Environmental Services


Bed Blocking


Bed Ahead


Bed Type

columns.name: EVENT_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The bed event source category number for this bed event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Discharge


Transfer


Ad-Hoc Request


Maintenance Cleaning


Leave of Absence


Auto Creation by Scheduling Non-Bed Clean

columns.name: BED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the bed that this bed event pertains to.

columns.name: BED_ID_BED_LABEL
columns.description: The name of the bed.

columns.name: EAF_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the location containing the bed that this bed event pertains to.

columns.name: PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The priority category number for the bed event.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Stat


Next


Normal

columns.name: DEP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department containing the bed that this bed event pertains to.

columns.name: EPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient that was associated with this bed event.

columns.name: EPT_CSN
columns.description: The unique contact serial number of the patient encounter that was associated with this bed event.

columns.name: REASN_BED_NT_ASGN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason not assigned category number for the bed event (if applicable). This item is cleared when the bed is assigned for cleaning.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


CMJ test

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DT
columns.description: The date when this record was created.

columns.name: CANCEL_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user record for the user who canceled this bed event. This column is only populated for events that have been canceled.

columns.name: CANCEL_EVENT_TM
columns.description: The instant when the bed event was canceled. This column is only populated for events that have been canceled.

columns.name: ADHOC_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user record for the user who created this bed event. This column is only populated for cleaning requests that weren't created automatically.

columns.name: LINKED_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Admission, Transfer, Discharge, or Leave of Absence (ADT) event that is associated with this bed event.

columns.name: BLOCK_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The blocking reason category number for the bed event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: BLOCK_SRC_ISO_C_NAME
columns.description:
The isolation category number that was the source of this bed event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: BLOCK_SRC_INF_C_NAME
columns.description:
The infection category number that was the source of this bed event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: BED_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks the bed type for the bed associated with the bed event record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Empty


Standard


Crib


Telemetry


Bariatric

columns.name: PREV_OUT_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the previous outgoing event of type Discharge, Transfer Out or LOA Out. If the previous event on the bed is of type incoming (Admission, Transfer In, LOA Return) instead of an outgoing type, then this item will be empty.

columns.name: NEXT_IN_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the next incoming event of type Admission, Transfer In, or LOA Return. If the next event on the bed is of type outgoing (Discharge, Transfer Out, LOA Out) instead of an incoming type, then this item will be empty.
